Articles.Content:
This is a mod that i have been brainstorming this for awhile now, i guess this had to be made.

First dev screenshot, South Returia's Harmony command module, needs texturing though.

Huge bump! I've been working on things in Wings 3D. So here's the Selene Command Module! The Selene spacecraft belongs to United Plutonic Federation, along with the Oneiropolos Cagro Vehicle. The first version will contain the Selene spacecraft, and the Oneiropolos cargo vehicle (basically a unmanned selene that totes cargo.. and contraband kerbals)

Edited December 31, 2014 by Sylandro

DP: Thanks to Beale (have to give mad respect to him!), he helped made an early texture for the Selene command module.

Then, i finished the texture for it!
Update: The texture for the Selene will be redone.
